name: haxegon
description: A tiny Haxe programming library for beginners. Powered by OpenFL and Starling.
releasenote: Work in progress, getting more and more stable! 0.13.0 updates haxegon to be compatible with the latest versions of OpenFL (8.4.1), Lime (7.0.0) and Starling (2.4.1). See http://www.haxegon.com for documentation and examples, or track the project's development on github: https://github.com/haxegon/haxegon.
